Today, Dan tells Jordan all about the 15th installment of his increasingly frustrating investigation into why [[Alex Jones]] joined up with Team Trump back in 2015. Topics covered include:

*How many of Alex's guests can make completely embarrassing predictions on the show?
*How many terrible impressions is Alex capable of?
*What is less likely than [[Larry Nichols]] becoming a duck?
*Is Randy Quaid "credible?"
